originalText.text: First, it was incredibly easy to make an appointment - and the best part; they were on time!  Everyone was so friendly and professional; and they were able to fix my prescription (from another provider).  So glad I found them!

text.text: First, it was incredibly easy to make an appointment - and the best part; they were on time!  Everyone was so friendly and professional; and they were able to fix my prescription (from another provider).  So glad I found them!

originalText.text: I highly recommend this place. Doug is very friendly and knowledgeable. He went above and beyond for me. Great customer service and there’s a nice assortment of glasses to choose from.

text.text: I highly recommend this place. Doug is very friendly and knowledgeable. He went above and beyond for me. Great customer service and there’s a nice assortment of glasses to choose from.

originalText.text: I made an appointment for a regular eye exam and today was the first time visiting this facility.  The doctor and the entire staffs were extremely cordial and attentive.  I've been to other larger facilities where the service is a lot more rush and less personable which made my experience at Creston Optical a lot more enjoyable.  I'd highly recommend this facility.

text.text: I made an appointment for a regular eye exam and today was the first time visiting this facility.  The doctor and the entire staffs were extremely cordial and attentive.  I've been to other larger facilities where the service is a lot more rush and less personable which made my experience at Creston Optical a lot more enjoyable.  I'd highly recommend this facility.

originalText.text: We were traveling to NYC for the day and my daughter's contact ripped and we didn't have spares. Creston was wonderful! They helped us out right off the street and literally saved our day! Highly recommend!

text.text: We were traveling to NYC for the day and my daughter's contact ripped and we didn't have spares. Creston was wonderful! They helped us out right off the street and literally saved our day! Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Making an appointment is easy and picking up contacts is convenient. The frame selection was a bit limited in my opinion. I was unable to keep my first appointment because my insurance coverage got delayed, but they were understanding and gave me a few pairs of contacts to hold me over - super happy with the service. If they’re closed on a certain day, you can still pickup contacts/frames from the doorman if you request in advance.
